metadata.title: CVE-2024-43442 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input done by an attacker with admin privileges('Cross-site Scripting') inÂ  OTRS (System Configuration modules) and((OTRS)) Community Edition allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) within theSystem Configuration targeting other admins.This issue affects:  *  OTRS from 7.0.X through 7.0.50  *  OTRS 8.0.X  *  OTRS 2023.X  *  OTRS from 2024.X through 2024.5.X  *  ((OTRS)) Community Edition: 6.0.xProducts based on the ((OTRS)) Community Edition also very likely to beaffected

criterions.comment: znuny package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
